mapper.sql: member_id, member_password, member_name, member_phone, member_zipcode, member_address, member_sub_address, member_assign
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET member_password=#{memberPassword}, member_name=#{memberName}, member_phone=#{memberPhone}, member_zipcode=#{memberZipcode}, member_address=#{memberAddress}, member_sub_address=#{memberSubAddress}, member_assign=#{memberAssign} WHERE member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(member_id) FROM MEMBER WHERE member_id=#{memberId}
